How much Clint could Eastwood would if Eastwood could Clint would?

No questions. I just wanted to say thank you. When I was 1st introduced to your band (Your Clint Eastwood music video on MTV back when MTV was good...) I was in a bad place. A high schooler that just couldn't fit in. Your music made me realize you don't have to fit in and it's ok to be a little weird. Thanks guys! Can't wait to see you in Detroit!
I can't help but think of portal. The visuals would be outstanding and there's a lot of room to work with in the plot.

Terry, if you see this, please inform me if you do a AMA. 1) What was your favorite phone call? 2) What moment with Mike made you so angry that you had to leave the room? Thank you for everything you have done for our city!!!
He gets me every... single... time. Think I'm safe? Nope! I let my guard down for a week or 2, then BAM! Mankind through the announcers table. Son of a bitch...

Scene: Laundromat. Dusk.
The setting sun gave way to the occasional glistening of a washer door being closed. Steven Liftnitski (u/_Dark_secrets) frantically loads his clothes into one of the machines in the corner. Being a redditer, there is no other option. As he quickly throws his sullied clothes from a previous laundromat encounter into Jasmin, (that's the washing machines name) he notices a glimmer out of the corner of his eye. It was just a flash, but it changed his life forever...
No annnnnnd no.
There's been some crazy shit in baseball. This might take the cake.
